page.title: 09LIFE OF A SHOPKEEPER
page.content: Mr Pigg is a newsagent with two busy shops in Ramsgate.His day begins at 0630 when he leaves home to collect 9 different daily papers(13 on Sunday) from Ramsgate railway station.These are taken to his shops where the delivery rounds are made up for his 11 paper boys and girls.At about 0900 he goes home for breakfast and a wash after which he returns for a busy morning selling newspapers,magazines, crisps,sweets and tobacco.At 1300 he goes home for lunch and a rest returning to his shop at about 1500. At 1700 the shops close and the days takings of about Â£300 is counted.The remainder of the day is spent with his family watching television or indulging in his passion for Grand Prix racing.The day ends at about 2230.This routine is followed every working day.
